title: Three solutions
description: Two correct and many incorrect ways to write this program

comments: Hint #1 There's more than one program that solves this puzzle.
The speed of the program often depends on
the number of statements the processor (CPU)
Can you see three solutions? Which one is fastest? Slowest?
Hint #2 I wonder what happens if you go too far?
Hint #3 What will you do with each line? Up,Down,Delete?
